subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[move]] (someone); to [[affect]]; to [[touch]]; to [[arouse]]
# [[response]]; [[influence]]
# to [[feel]]; to [[perceive]]
# [[feeling]]; [[thought]]; [[sensation]]; [[emotion]]
# to [[thank]]; to [[feel]] [[grateful]]
# to [[sigh]] with [[emotion]]; to be [[sentimental]]
# to [[miss]]; to [[long]] for
# {{lb|zh|TCM}} to be [[affect]]ed by [[wind]]-[[cold]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: A popular stylistic choice in the written form of the character {{l|zh|感}} involves putting the {{l|zh|心}} component inside of the {{l|zh|咸}} component in the area directly below the 口 component.

subSections.title: Compounds
